history.proof: intros A p. induction p. - apply pre_domok_incr_chain_0. - apply pre_domok_incr_chain_1. apply IHp.

original: intros A p. induction p. - apply pre_domok_incr_chain_0. - apply pre_domok_incr_chain_1. + apply IHp. + apply chain_incr. * apply chain_def_ok. apply IHp. * apply chain_incr with (r:=r) in IHp. apply IHp.
